description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take a job as a professional decoy. Learn to master your vehicle and let the commander take you on an action-filled journey of crazy missions. Avoid magnetic mines, bomb planes, tanks and EMP-dropping choppers. In infinite mode you can challenge yourself and see how long you will survive.  Now with alternative steering.
description.short: Take a job as a professional decoy. Learn to master your vehicle and let the commander take you on an action-filled journey of crazy missions. Avoid magnetic mines, bomb planes, tanks and EMP-dropping choppers. In infinite mode you can challenge yourself and see how long you will survive.  Now with alternative steering.
